alert.note: Alert for Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chilton County through 645 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thorsby, or near Jemison, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calera, Clanton, Jemison, Thorsby, Maplesville, Gap Of The Mountain, Lay Lake Dam, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Verbena, Pooles Crossroads, Mitchell Lake, Lay Lake, Minooka Park, Lomax, Stanton, Waxahatchee Creek, I 65 Rest Area, Isabella, Cooper and Mitchell Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
